resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75944</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75944</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>41628812-9820-4493-2908-9fc4103a319b#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Villatervek rajza: svájci ház-típus, villa magyaros elemekkel, angol századfordulós villa</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing of villa schemes: Swiss house-type, villa with Hungarian elements, English villa from turn of the century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung der Landhausentwürfe: Schweizer 
Haus-Typ, Landhaus mit ungarischen Elementen, englisches Landhaus von 
der Jahrhundertwende</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma des arrangements de villa : 
Maison-type suisse, villa avec les éléments hongrois, villa 
anglaise du tournant du siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho de esquemas do villa: Casa-tipo 
suíço, villa com elementos hungarian, villa inglês da volta do 
século</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione degli schemi della villa: 
Casa-tipo svizzero, villa con gli elementi ungheresi, villa 
inglese dalla girata del secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο των σχεδίων βιλών: Ελβετικός 
σπίτι-τύπος, βίλα με τα ουγγρικά στοιχεία, αγγλική βίλα από τη
στροφή του αιώνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráfico de los esquemas del chalet: 
Casa-tipo suizo, chalet con los elementos húngaros, chalet 
inglés de la vuelta del siglo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Villatervek rajza: svájci ház-típus (Schiller János: Villa Waldheim, 1893), villa magyaros elemekkel (Feszl Frigyes ideálterve, 1874), angol századfordulós villa (C.F.A. Voysey lakóháza, Puttenhaym, 1900) sorrend: 26_02, 26_01, 26_03</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing of villa schemes: Swiss house-type (János Schiller: Villa Waldheim, 1893), villa with Hungarian elements (Frigyes Feszl's ideal scheme, 1874), English villa from turn of the century (C.F.A. Voysey's living-house, Puttenhaym, 1900) order: 26_02, 26_01, 26_03</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókeresztény művészet,  bizánci művészet,  népvándorlás kori művészet,  </string>
            <string language="en">ancient Christian art,  Byzantine art,  art of the migration period,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnung der Landhausentwürfe: Schweizer 
Haus-Typ (János Schiller: Landhaus Waldheim, 1893), Landhaus 
mit ungarischen Elementen (Frigyes Feszls idealer Entwurf, 1874), 
englisches Landhaus von der Umdrehung der Ordnung des Jahrhunderts 
(C.F.A. Voyseys Lebenhaus, Puttenhaym, 1900): 26_02, 26_01, 
26_03</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma des arrangements de villa : 
Maison-type suisse (János Schiller : Villa Waldheim, 
1893), villa avec les éléments hongrois (arrangement idéal de 
Frigyes Feszl, 1874), villa anglaise du tour de la commande de siècle
(vivre-maison de C.F.A. Voysey's, Puttenhaym, 1900) : 26_02, 
26_01, 26_03</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenho de esquemas do villa: Casa-tipo 
suíço (János Schiller: Villa Waldheim, 1893), villa com 
elementos hungarian (esquema ideal de Frigyes Feszl, 1874), villa 
inglês da volta da ordem do século (viv-casa de C.F.A. Voysey, 
Puttenhaym, 1900): 26_02, 26_01, 26_03</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione degli schemi della villa: 
Casa-tipo svizzero (János Schiller: Villa Waldheim, 
1893), villa con gli elementi ungheresi (schema ideale di Frigyes 
Feszl, 1874), villa inglese dalla girata dell'ordine di secolo 
(viv-casa del C.F.A. Voysey, Puttenhaym, 1900): 26_02, 26_01, 
26_03</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο των σχεδίων βιλών: Ελβετικός 
σπίτι-τύπος (Jαnos Schiller: βίλα Waldheim, 1893), 
βίλα με τα ουγγρικά στοιχεία (ιδανικό σχέδιο Frigyes Feszl,
1874), αγγλική βίλα από τη στροφή η του αιώνα (ζω-σπίτι 
C.F.A. Voysey, Puttenhaym, 1900) κατάταξη: 26_02, 
26_01, 26_03</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráfico de los esquemas del chalet: 
Casa-tipo suizo (János Schiller: Chalet Waldheim, 1893), 
chalet con los elementos húngaros (esquema ideal de Frigyes Feszl, 
1874), chalet inglés de la vuelta de la orden del siglo (vivir-casa 
de C.F.A. Voysey, Puttenhaym, 1900): 26_02, 26_01, 26_03</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">alte christliche kunst, byzantinische kunst, kunst der 
Migration Periode,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art chrétien antique, art bizantin, art de la période 
de transfert,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte christian antiga, arte byzantine, arte do período 
da migração,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte cristiana antica, arte byzantine, arte del periodo 
di espansione,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αρχαία χριστιανική τέχνη, βυζαντινή τέχνη, τέχνη της 
περιόδου μετανάστευσης,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte cristiano antiguo, arte byzantine, arte del 
período de la migración,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75944</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=41628812-9820-4493-2908-9fc4103a319b&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
